operations.description: Register the subscription for Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/register/action

operations.description: Unregister the subscription for Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/unregister/action

operations.description: Retrieves all MySQL discovery sites across all resource groups within a subscription, providing a comprehensive view of MySQL discovery environments.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/read

operations.description: Retrieves all MySQL discovery sites within a specific resource group, providing an overview of discovery environments and their current status.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/read

operations.description: Partially updates specific properties of an existing MySQL discovery site without replacing the entire resource. Use this operation to modify tags or update site configuration parameters.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/write

operations.description: Permanently removes a MySQL discovery site and all its associated discovery data. This operation cannot be undone and will stop all ongoing discovery processes for the site.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/delete

operations.description: Creates a new MySQL discovery site or updates an existing one. This operation establishes the discovery environment for MySQL servers and configures the association with master sites and migration projects.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/write

operations.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific MySQL discovery site, including its configuration, associated resources, and current operational status.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/read

operations.description: Trigger Refresh Refresh action
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/refresh/action

operations.description: Retrieves all MySQL servers discovered within a specific discovery site.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/MySQLServers/read

operations.description: Partially updates specific properties of a discovered MySQL server without replacing the entire discovery record. Use this operation to update tags, labels, or specific server metrics.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/MySQLServers/write

operations.description: Removes a MySQL server from the discovery inventory, deleting all associated discovery data and metrics for the specified server.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/MySQLServers/delete

operations.description: Creates or updates the discovery record for a MySQL server with detailed configuration, version information, database metrics, and host machine properties.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/MySQLServers/write

operations.description: Retrieves comprehensive information about a specific discovered MySQL server, including version details, database count, host machine properties, and current support status.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/MySQLServers/read

operations.description: Gets the Summaries resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/summaries/read

operations.description: Lists the Summaries resource in MySQLSites.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/summaries/read

operations.description: Gets the ErrorSummaries resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/errorSummaries/read

operations.description: Lists the ErrorSummaries resource in MySQLSites.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/errorSummaries/read

operations.description: read operations
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/operations/read

operations.description: read operationStatuses
operations.name: Microsoft.MySqlDiscovery/locations/operationStatuses/read

operations.description: write operationStatuses
operations.name: Microsoft.MySqlDiscovery/locations/operationStatuses/write

operations.description: Trigger Refresh Refresh action
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/refresh/action

operations.description: Retrieves all MySQL discovery agents configured within a specific discovery site, including their health status, configuration details, and operational information.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/read

operations.description: Partially updates specific properties of a MySQL discovery agent, such as health details or configuration parameters, without replacing the entire agent resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/write

operations.description: Permanently removes a MySQL discovery agent from the site, stopping all discovery operations performed by this agent and cleaning up associated configurations.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/delete

operations.description: Creates a new MySQL discovery agent or updates an existing one with service principal credentials, appliance configuration, and fabric site association for performing MySQL discovery operations.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/write

operations.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific MySQL discovery agent, including its health status, service principal configuration, and associated appliance details.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/read

operations.description: Initiates a refresh operation for a specific MySQL discovery agent to re-discover MySQL servers, update configurations, and synchronize with the latest environment state.
operations.name: Microsoft.MySQLDiscovery/MySQLSites/agents/refresh/action
